info.name: KODENotes
info.description: Набор запросов в API KODENotes. Запускать команды рекомендуется в той последовательности, в которой они представлены в коллекции.

response.name: Post Notes | Too large
response.body: {"detail":"text is too big: pass text with less than 10_000 characters"}

response.name: Notes | Wrong method
response.body: {"detail":"method PUT not allowed. Use eather GET or POST"}

response.name: Get Notes
Get Notes | New user
